availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky physician. Virginia native. Married Mary Scholl. Father of Almazar Scholl, Mary Scholl, Elizabeth Scholl and Landon C. Scholl. Occupation listed as druggist in 1860 and physician after 1870.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 278
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 558B
Find A Grave, "Dr Daniel Boone “D.B” Scholl (1818-1891)," Memorial #124014468, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/124014468 (accessed December 12, 2018).
